channel.title: Need Help Port fowarding

so i need some help
second problem is The ip chages sometimes.
first i was 100 now i,m 103
i want to know how to slove that to xD

item.title: Need Help Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Fatality Coder Fatality
item.description:
@Coder_Fatality wrote:

How To Make A Server.

Im going to give you some information on how to make a server.

Made By:Daniel

Step 1. Find a source. You can use moparscape to find one like go to server downloads.
THATS EASY!

Step 2.Go to no-ip.com and register an email and password
Then, go to host and add an ip. EXAMPLE:[Example].no-ip.biz
only put this in the box ^^^^^^^^^
|||||||||
Now download it and you got no-ip

Now, i dont really know to portfoward so i just use…Utorrent.
Http://www.utorrent.com Download it.
Soon as its downloaded go to preferences- connection now before you start putting 43594 as the port in be sure ur source is running first. then you can put it in and press apply. then press ok and exit out now your server works for other people and yourself!

to learn more add my msn.

Coder_Fatality@hotmail.com

HOPED THIS HELPED! And happy server owning!

CREDITS

99%ME
1%My Brain lol…
